name: Perfection (Phamility)
description:
INTRODUCTION

It is December 26th,

The day after Christmas.

Some are cautious.

Some are oblivious.

Some are prepared.

CONTROLS

Mouse for UI

WASD or ARROWS to move

E to Interact

CREDITS

Made by Phamility | Twitter

Art Style inspired by A Day in the Office by WinRawr

Title Music - Credo by Edward Karl Hanson | Youtube

NOTES

This game was made for Secret Santa Jam 2021

This game is a revamped version of one of my previous games called "Piece 42."

Honestly, so many emotions were fluctuated throughout the three weeks of making this game so some of the dialogue is just a BIT scuffed.
